Dear Rick

Not wishing to be 'picky', I tend to believe that the mistaken 
=
tendency to discount Namban tsuba is based upon their general poor 
quality=
 of design and production rather than upon the fact that they 
are cast.  I=
n an attempt to salvage the reputation of this group 
perhaps, if you ask h=
im nicely, Ron Hartman will send you an image of 
his Tokubetsu Hozon Namba=
n tsuba?

Regards, John L.
